subject: Pro X pedals - Haptic motor not working
description_text:
Hi there, I just purchased the Pro X pedals, and I cannot get the haptic
motor to work with the control box.  Im trying to trigger the haptic motor
with the Simsonn manager app.  I see no voltage output at all.
Do i need a special control box that didn't come with my Pro X pedals?

Thanks,

Pete

--

conversations.body_text: Hi Pete Herath,    Have you already purchased the motor? Please note that an external 24V power supply is required to test the vibration.
